sense.gloss: to loiter, to putter, to prowl, to wander about, to roam about, to knock around

sdata.j: お↑客様↑↓きゃく|さま↓↑用↑↓よう|↓の↑駐車↑↓ちゅうしゃ↓↑場↑↓じょう↓があります。
sdata.e: We have a parking lot for the customers.
